article.class: fl-post post-4 page type-page status-publish hentry

a.span: Friendship Academy Of The Arts Distance Learning Plan

div.h5: Where friendship and academic excellence meet

div.p: A tuition-free charter school, Friendship Academy of the Arts welcomes one and all to share our public school setting with a private school feel.

div.class: uabb-module-content uabb-button-wrap uabb-creative-button-wrap uabb-button-width-custom uabb-creative-button-width-custom uabb-button-left uabb-creative-button-left uabb-button-reponsive-center uabb-creative-button-reponsive-center uabb-button-has-icon uabb-creative-button-has-icon

div.class: uabb-module-content uabb-infobox infobox-center infobox-responsive-center infobox-has-icon infobox-icon-above-title

div.p: The Friendship Way is the core of who we are and the foundation to our programming.

div.class: uabb-module-content uabb-infobox infobox-center infobox-responsive-center infobox-has-icon infobox-icon-above-title

div.p: Leadership is a critical life skill that must be intentionally developed.

div.class: uabb-module-content uabb-infobox infobox-center infobox-responsive-center infobox-has-icon infobox-icon-above-title

div.p: Arts integration enhances the learner intellectually and culturally.

div.class: uabb-module-content uabb-infobox infobox-center infobox-responsive-center infobox-has-icon infobox-icon-above-title

div.p: Family involvement is critical to learning.

div.class: uabb-module-content uabb-infobox infobox-center infobox-responsive-center infobox-has-icon infobox-icon-above-title

img.alt: Achieve academic excellence with ur one-on-one learning program that prioritizes deep understanding of concepts. (9)-page-001.jpg
img.title: AchieveAcademicExcellence

div.p: Receive a monthly update on all of our latest news and events.

is_redirect && ! is_confirmation;if(is_form){jQuery('#gform_wrapper_4').html(form_content.html());if(form_content.hasClass('gform_validation_error')){jQuery('#gform_wrapper_4').addClass('gform_validation_error');} else {jQuery('#gform_wrapper_4').removeClass('gform_validation_error');}setTimeout( function() { /* delay the scroll by 50 milliseconds to fix a bug in chrome */ jQuery(document).scrollTop(jQuery('#gform_wrapper_4').offset().top); }, 50 );if(window['gformInitDatepicker']) {gformInitDatepicker();}if(window['gformInitPriceFields']) {gformInitPriceFields();}var current_page = jQuery('#gform_source_page_number_4').val();gformInitSpinner( 4, 'http://friendshipacademy.org/wp-content/plugins/gravityforms/images/spinner.gif' );jQuery(document).trigger('gform_page_loaded', [4, current_page]);window['gf_submitting_4'] = false;}else if(!is_redirect){var confirmation_content = jQuery(this).contents().find('.GF_AJAX_POSTBACK').html();if(!confirmation_content){confirmation_content = contents;}setTimeout(function(){jQuery('#gform_wrapper_4').replaceWith(confirmation_content);jQuery(document).scrollTop(jQuery('#gf_4').offset().top);jQuery(document).trigger('gform_confirmation_loaded', [4]);window['gf_submitting_4'] = false;}, 50);}else{jQuery('#gform_4').append(contents);if(window['gformRedirect']) {gformRedirect();}}jQuery(document).trigger('gform_post_render', [4, current_page]);} );} );
